My son worked for Sendiks all through high school & college. During the school vacations & every summer he worked full time & even got a Christmas bonus. He loved working for them & was treated well. Maybe not offering full time work to someone is a way of getting rid of employees who aren't working out well. He was pd $8.00 an hr, which was way over minimum wage then.

Funny.... Donald J. Trump is a Republican, and he doesn't seem to be having trouble with the media. Has anyone noticed that Ted Cruz is ALWAYS looking for someone to blame for his own failures? He blames the GOP leaders in the Senate and House. He blames President Obama. He blames the Supreme Court. Now he blames the media. Is it possible that maybe -- just maybe -- Senator Ted Cruz over-promised his voters something he KNEW he could not deliver...just so he could get elected?
: I stand corrected on Denmark/Scandinavia - I was really thinking about Norway and Sweden. Yes, the capitalist elements are critical to have, but with restraints. We don't have those in the US.
